options.description: The Valley Metro Light Rail has several stops near the Footprint Center, providing easy access from various parts of the city.
Multiple bus routes run through downtown Phoenix, making it convenient to reach the venue.
Services like Uber and Lyft offer convenient options for getting to and from games, with designated pickup and drop-off areas.
Bike racks are available around the Footprint Center, and the city's bike share program offers an eco-friendly way to get to the game.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Attending games on weekdays can often lead to lower ticket prices. Group discounts are typically available. Keep an eye out for special promotions.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets only from verified sources to avoid counterfeit tickets. Using reputable secondary marketplaces with buyer protections is advisable. Be wary of purchasing tickets from sellers outside the venue.
